name: World of Hex Viewer
description:
World of Hex Viewer gives you a free way to watch the changing world of "World of Hex".

World of Hex is a game of strategy played on a board as big as our world where the land-masses of the world are divided into hexagonal tiles, and each of those tiles is a game board — with a state that is alive in the cloud.

World of Hex Viewer allows you to watch, on your TV, the state of the world change as players interact, and claim territory for their team.

You can interact with the world by spinning to different points and zooming in. The only thing you can't do is play.

For that you will need the full app, World of Hex.

If you like a strategy, turn based game, then World of Hex is both simple to play but world-spanning in its scope.

Please note that World of Hex makes use of iCloud and as such, requires you to be logged into iCloud on your iPhone, iPad or Apple TV.
